embed.title: Vote-Link
embed.description:
You can vote on [Top.gg](https://top.gg/bot/965903240384376872/vote). With every vote you get {plusVoteTokens} more skips.
You have {votes} through votes.

howtouse.name: How to use the emojiquiz?
howtouse.value:
1. Use </emojiquiz setup:{commandId}>.
2. Use </emojiquiz toggle:{commandId}>
Then everything starts.

whynotworking.name: Why does the emoji quiz no longer work?
whynotworking.value: Please use </emojiquiz fix:{commandId}>. If it still does not work after that, please contact support [here](https://discord.gg/BQumAujuvk).

howtoskip.name: What can you do if you can't find the term?
howtoskip.value: You can use the "Skip" button. If you have no more skips, you must vote [here](https://top.gg/bot/965903240384376872/vote). With every vote you get {plusVoteTokens} skips. You currently have {votes} skips.

whereissupport.name: Where can I contact the support team?

fix.channel-not-set: {x} There is no emojiquiz channel. Set one with </emojiquiz setup:{commandId}>.

embed.title: Help Menu
embed.description:
- The bot is based on `/`-Commands. Therefore, it is much easier to use the bot.
- You have to choose an option from the select menu.
- If you have a question, bug or something like that, feel free to join the [Support Server](https://discord.gg/BQumAujuvk).
Note: Use </bot info:1058376602515411061> to get more information about me.

embed.title: Manage your servers

- [Manage](https://my.endelon-hosting.de/)
- [MySQL Admin](https://mysqladmin.endelon-hosting.de/)
- [Documentation](https://docs.endelon-hosting.de/)
- [Donate (voluntary!)](https://www.paypal.me/masusniper)

**Manage the server [{name}](url)**
- You can start this server with the lower button called "Start".

embed.description:
## Manage the system
- List: Get a list of current channels
- Debug: Test and fix errors
- Reset: Reset the settings
- Toggle: Activate or deactivate the system
- Add channel: Add a channel
- Remove channel: Remove a channel

## Autoroles
- List: Get a list of current autoroles
- Debug: Test and fix errors
- Reset: Reset the settings
- Toggle: Activate or deactivate the autoroles
- Add roles: Add an autorole
- Remove roles: Remove an autorole
